subcommands.name: index
subcommands.description: Index database sequences in the FASTA format

subcommands.name: mem
subcommands.description: Align 70bp-1Mbp query sequences with the BWA-MEM algorithm

subcommands.name: aln
subcommands.description: Find the SA coordinates of the input reads

subcommands.name: samse
subcommands.description: Generate alignments in the SAM format given single-end reads

subcommands.name: sampe
subcommands.description: Generate alignments in the SAM format given paired-end reads

subcommands.name: bwasw
subcommands.description: Align query sequences in the in.fq file
